title: In 'Rhythm,' Bhi Bhiman's Music Isn't Limited By National Borders
teaser: Bhi Bhiman had an all-American childhood, but his songs have an international character. He talks with NPR's Scott Simon about his childhood, his politics and his new album, Rhythm & Reason.
